sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const LisbonneMobileLanding = () => { const [currentTestimonial, setCurrentTestimonial] = useState(0); const [formStep, setFormStep] = useState(0); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ nom: '', email: '', telephone: '', experience: '', disponibilite: '', motivation: '' }); useEffect(() => { document.title = "Poste Francophone Lisbonne - Logement Inclus, Départ 14 jours"; }, []); const testimonials = [ { text: "En 6 mois à Lisbonne, j'ai progressé professionnellement et découvert un art de vivre incroyable.", author: "Marie D.", role: "Conseillère client" }, { text: "Le processus était si fluide ! En 2 semaines j'étais installé et opérationnel.", author: "Thomas M.", role: "Support technique" }, { text: "Salaire sur 14 mois, assurance privée... Les avantages sont réels.", author: "Lucas P.", role: "Conseiller senior" } ]; const trackEvent = (eventName) => { console.log(`FB Pixel: ${eventName}`); }; const handleFormSubmit = () => { trackEvent('Lead'); alert('Merci ! Nous vous recontacterons sous 48h.'); }; const nextFormStep = () => { if (formStep < 2) setFormStep(formStep + 1); }; const prevFormStep = () => { if (formStep > 0) setFormStep(formStep - 1); }; const updateFormData = (field, value) => { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const scrollToSection = (sectionId) => { const element = document.getElementById(sectionId); if (element) { element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; const styles = { container: { minHeight: '100vh', backgroundColor: '#263F58', color: 'white', fontFamily: 'system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif' }, header: { position: 'fixed', top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, zIndex: 50, backgroundColor: 'rgba(38, 63, 88, 0.9)', backdropFilter: 'blur(20px)', borderBottom: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)', padding: '12px 16px' }, nav: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center' }, logo: { fontSize: '18px', fontWeight: 'bold' }, navButton: { backgroundColor: 'white', color: '#1C1C1C', padding: '8px 16px', borderRadius: '8px', fontWeight: '600', border: 'none', cursor: 'pointer' }, section: { padding: '48px 16px' }, heroSection: { paddingTop: '80px', paddingBottom: '48px', paddingLeft: '16px', paddingRight: '16px' }, maxWidth: { maxWidth: '400px', margin: '0 auto', textAlign: 'center' }, badge: { display: 'inline-block', backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.1)', border: '1px solid rgba(255,215,0,0.3)', borderRadius: '50px', padding: '8px 16px', marginBottom: '24px', fontSize: '14px', fontWeight: '600', color: '#FFD700' }, title: { fontSize: '32px', fontWeight: '800', lineHeight: '1.1', marginBottom: '16px' }, highlight: { color: '#FFD700' }, subtitle: { fontSize: '18px', color: '#E5E7EB', marginBottom: '16px', fontWeight: '500' }, description: { color: '#9CA3AF', marginBottom: '32px' }, offerCard: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.05)', border: '1px solid rgba(255,215,0,0.2)', borderRadius: '16px', padding: '24px', marginBottom: '32px' }, offerTitle: { color: '#FFD700', fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize: '18px', marginBottom: '16px' }, offerGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: '1fr 1fr', gap: '12px', fontSize: '14px' }, offerItem: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '8px' }, checkmark: { width: '16px', height: '16px', backgroundColor: '#FFD700', borderRadius: '50%', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', color: '#1C1C1C', fontSize: '10px', fontWeight: 'bold' }, primaryButton: { width: '100%', backgroundColor: 'white', color: '#1C1C1C', padding: '16px', borderRadius: '12px', fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize: '16px', border: 'none', cursor: 'pointer', marginBottom: '16px' }, secondaryButton: { width: '100%', backgroundColor: 'transparent', color: '#E5E7EB', padding: '16px', borderRadius: '12px', fontWeight: '600', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)', cursor: 'pointer' }, statsSection: { padding: '32px 16px', backgroundColor: '#1a2d3f' }, statsGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: '1fr 1fr', gap: '16px', maxWidth: '400px', margin: '0 auto' }, statCard: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.05)', borderRadius: '12px', padding: '16px', textAlign: 'center', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)' }, statNumber: { fontSize: '24px', fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#FFD700', marginBottom: '4px' }, statLabel: { fontSize: '12px', color: '#9CA3AF', textTransform: 'uppercase' }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: '24px', fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: '32px' }, testimonialCard: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.05)', borderRadius: '12px', padding: '24px', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)', marginBottom: '16px' }, testimonialText: { fontStyle: 'italic', marginBottom: '16px', color: '#E5E7EB' }, testimonialAuthor: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', gap: '12px' }, avatar: { width: '40px', height: '40px', backgroundColor: '#FFD700', borderRadius: '50%', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', color: '#1C1C1C', fontWeight: 'bold' }, dots: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', gap: '8px', marginTop: '16px' }, dot: { width: '8px', height: '8px', borderRadius: '50%', cursor: 'pointer' }, featureCard: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.05)', borderRadius: '12px', padding: '16px', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)', marginBottom: '16px' }, featureHeader: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', gap: '12px' }, featureNumber: { width: '32px', height: '32px', backgroundColor: '#FFD700', borderRadius: '8px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', color: '#1C1C1C', fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize: '14px', flexShrink: 0 }, featureTitle: { fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '4px' }, featureDescription: { fontSize: '14px', color: '#9CA3AF' }, benefitItem: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', gap: '12px', backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.05)', borderRadius: '8px', padding: '12px', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)', marginBottom: '8px' }, benefitCheck: { width: '20px', height: '20px', backgroundColor: '#FFD700', borderRadius: '50%', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', color: '#1C1C1C', fontSize: '12px', fontWeight: 'bold', flexShrink: 0, marginTop: '2px' }, benefitText: { fontSize: '14px', color: '#E5E7EB' }, requirementCard: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.05)', borderRadius: '8px', padding: '16px', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)', marginBottom: '12px' }, requirementHeader: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '12px' }, essentialBadge: { backgroundColor: '#FFD700', color: '#1C1C1C', padding: '4px 8px', borderRadius: '20px', fontSize: '10px', fontWeight: 'bold' }, appreciatedBadge: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.2)', color: '#9CA3AF', padding: '4px 8px', borderRadius: '20px', fontSize: '10px', fontWeight: 'bold' }, formSection: { padding: '48px 16px', backgroundColor: '#0f1419' }, progressBar: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', gap: '8px', marginBottom: '32px' }, progressStep: { width: '32px', height: '4px', borderRadius: '2px' }, formCard: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.05)', borderRadius: '16px', padding: '24px', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)' }, formGroup: { marginBottom: '16px' }, label: { display: 'block', fontSize: '14px', fontWeight: '600', marginBottom: '8px' }, input: { width: '100%', padding: '12px', backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.05)', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)', borderRadius: '8px', color: 'white', fontSize: '16px' }, textarea: { width: '100%', padding: '12px', backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.05)', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)', borderRadius: '8px', color: 'white', fontSize: '16px', resize: 'none', minHeight: '80px' }, select: { width: '100%', padding: '12px', backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.05)', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)', borderRadius: '8px', color: 'white', fontSize: '16px' }, buttonGroup: { display: 'flex', gap: '12px', marginTop: '24px' }, backButton: { flex: 1, backgroundColor: 'transparent', color: 'white', padding: '12px', borderRadius: '8px', fontWeight: '600', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)', cursor: 'pointer' }, continueButton: { flex: 1, backgroundColor: '#FFD700', color: '#1C1C1C', padding: '12px', borderRadius: '8px', fontWeight: 'bold', border: 'none', cursor: 'pointer' }, floatingCTA: { position: 'fixed', bottom: '16px', left: '16px', right: '16px', zIndex: 40 }, footer: { padding: '32px 16px', textAlign: 'center', backgroundColor: '#0f1419', borderTop: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)' } }; return (
